page.title: 17 GAMES London,Pig in Middle.
page.content: LONDON.To play London you need at least three or more children.One child stands with their backs towards the other children and spells"London" out loud while the rest of the children walk across the playground towards the speller.When London has been spelt the speller turns round to see if anyone is moving.If the speller sees anybody move that person has to go back again to the start.The winner is the child who gets across the playground without being seen by the speller. PIG IN THE MIDDLE.For this game you need three children and a ball.Two of the players throw the ball to each other over the head of the third player.If the one in the middle can catch the ball then this player changes places with the player who threw the ball and the game starts again.
